param.span: Flags that specify the inheritance propagation properties for the new ACE.

span.span: Flags that specify the inheritance propagation properties for the new ACE.

param.name: objectFlags
param.span: Flags that specify if the objectType and inheritedObjectType parameters contain non- values.

span.span: Flags that specify if the objectType and inheritedObjectType parameters contain non- values.

param.name: objectType
param.span: The identity of the class of objects to which the new ACE applies.

span.span: The identity of the class of objects to which the new ACE applies.

param.name: inheritedObjectType
param.span: The identity of the class of child objects which can inherit the new ACE.

span.span: The identity of the class of child objects which can inherit the new ACE.

summary.span: Sets the specified access control for the specified object.

span.span: Sets the specified access control for the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 모든 기존 액세스 제어 항목 (Ace)와 일치 하는 둘 다 지정 하는이 메서드가 제거 개체와 지정 된 액세스 한정자 (허용 또는 거부) 합니다.This method removes all existing Access Control Entries (ACEs) that match both specified object and the specified access qualifier (allow or deny).
